Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as myriad people come to the door of the king to serve him, and each one is told to prefer service that he is capable and fit to do;

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as many needy persons come to a kind-hearted donor and he gives them whatever each one asks, thus allaying distress of each one of them.

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Similarly many Sikhs come into the refuge of the True Guru, and whatever devotion and love one has in the mind the , True Guru fulfils it accordingly.  (674)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ਤਿਵੇਂ ਗੁਰੂ ਜੀ ਦੀ ਸ਼ਰਨ ਅਨੇਕਾਂ ਸਿਖ ਆਉਂਦੇ ਹਨ; ਪਰ ਜੈਸੀ ਜੈਸੀ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਭਾਉਣੀ ਹੁੰਦੀ ਹੈ ਵੈਸੀਆਂ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀਆਂ ਕਾਮਨਾਂ ਗੁਰੂ ਜੀ ਪੂਰਨ ਕਰ ਦੇਂਦੇ ਹਨ॥੬੭੪॥
